PF2EBB.Settings.Debug.ToggleHint: Verbose debug logs will be printed to the browser console.
PF2EBB.Settings.ADF.ToggleHint: Allows consumption of the Harrow Omen effect if the Avoid Dire Fate button is pressed.  Token needs updated Avoid Dire Fate reaction.
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.ToggleName: Give players a bone for long combats
PF2EBB.Settings.ED.ToggleHint: Runs the Escalation Die! logic at combat start and whenever the combat round changes.
PF2EBB.Settings.NF.ToggleHint: Add a reminder to the chat if the Nudge Fate effect would change the outcome of the result.
